statements: SELECT * FROM historical_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT price FROM historical_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_id = 2 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT date, price FROM historical_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_id = 3 AND date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM historical_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_id = 4;
SELECT cryptocurrency_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM historical_prices GROUP BY cryptocurrency_id ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_id, price, date FROM historical_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC, date DESC
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price FROM historical_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT cryptocurrency_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM historical_prices GROUP BY cryptocurrency_id HAVING AVG(price) > 50
SELECT cryptocurrency_id, COUNT(*) AS price_count FROM historical_prices GROUP BY cryptocurrency_id ORDER BY price_count DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT id, name, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT name, symbol, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE volume < 1000000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT name, price, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS price_date FROM cryptocurrencies JOIN price_history ON cryptocurrencies.id = price_history.cryptocurrency_id ORDER BY price_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 10000 ORDER BY name ASC, symbol DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price < 5000 ORDER BY market_cap ASC;
SELECT c.name, ph.price, ph.date FROM cryptocurrencies c JOIN price_history ph ON c.id = ph.cryptocurrency_id WHERE ph.price > 10000 ORDER BY ph.date DESC;
SELECT c.name, c.symbol, ph.price, ph.date FROM cryptocurrencies c JOIN price_history ph ON c.id = ph.cryptocurrency_id WHERE c.price > 5000 AND ph.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT name, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000;
SELECT symbol, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT cryptocurrency_id, prediction, confidence FROM trend_forecasting WHERE forecast_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY confidence DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE volume > 50000;
SELECT name, price, timestamp FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_id, prediction, forecast_date FROM trend_forecasting WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies;
SELECT id, name, symbol FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT symbol, name FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE symbol = 'BTC';
SELECT * FROM price_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_id, price, date FROM price_data WHERE cryptocurrency_id = 2 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT name, symbol FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM price_data WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT analysis.sentiment, trends.trend, price_data.price FROM analysis JOIN trends ON analysis.trend_id = trends.id JOIN price_data ON trends.cryptocurrency_id = price_data.cryptocurrency_id;

SELECT cryptocurrencies.name, trends.trend, MAX(price_data.price) AS highest_price FROM cryptocurrencies JOIN trends ON cryptocurrencies.id = trends.cryptocurrency_id JOIN price_data ON trends.cryptocurrency_id = price_data.cryptocurrency_id GROUP BY cryptocurrencies.name, trends.trend;
SELECT cryptocurrency_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM price_data GROUP BY cryptocurrency_id HAVING AVG(price) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM historical_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM market_segments WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend LIKE '%bull%' AND analysis_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT c.name, h.price, h.date FROM cryptocurrencies c JOIN historical_prices h ON c.id = h.cryptocurrency_id WHERE h.price > 500 ORDER BY h.price ASC;
SELECT t.trend, t.analysis_result FROM trend_analysis t WHERE t.cryptocurrency_id = 3;
SELECT e.name AS exchange_name, e.location AS location, c.name AS cryptocurrency_name FROM exchange_info e JOIN cryptocurrencies c ON e.id = c.id WHERE e.location = 'USA';
